full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUGS RJE CHEN PO GRONG KHYER KUN SGROL LA BRTEN NAS YIG DRUG 'DON THABS NGAN SONG RGYUN GCOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI DAD LDAN BLA SMAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RDO RJE DNGUL TAm LHA RDZAS BCAS BSKUL NGOR SNGAGS RAM PA BLO BZANG CHOS 'DZIN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,) DPAR BZHENGS DGE 'DIS RGYAL BSTAN GONG DU 'PHEL ZHING BSTAN 'DZIN ZHABS PAD YUN DU BRTAN, ,MA BYUNG RIGS DRUG SEMS CAN KUN KYANG GNAS SKABS TSE DANG BSOD NAMS DPAL 'BYOR RGYAS, ,MTHAR THUG BDE BA CAN DU PADMA LAS SKYES 'OD DPAG MED MGON SRAS SU 'GYUR, ,GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI NYER SPYOD BDAG KYANG LAM BZANG 'DIR BRTEN ZUNG 'JUG MYUR THOB SHOG ,DPAR 'DI NI BSKUL BA PO DGE SLONG BLA SMAN PA BLO BZANG RDO RJES RGYU YON SBYOR TE LEGS PAR BZHENGS PA'O,, ,,)
